name: Sweet Curry Pumpkin Seeds
author: ziblizard
summary: I added the curry as an experiment and was very pleased with the addition to these sweet and crunchy seeds.
ingredients: 1 ½ cups fresh pumpkin seeds, washed and dried
3 tablespoons vegetable oil, or as needed
directions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Combine pumpkin seeds, brown sugar, cinnamon, and curry powder in a bowl
Add vegetable oil gradually, until lightly coated
Spread seeds evenly on a baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven for 10 minutes
Remove the sheet from the oven and flip the seeds
Continue baking, flipping seeds every 10 minutes, until crunchy and golden brown, 20 to 30 minutes
